name: Rating
label: rating
definition: standing of something at a particular time, indicated by at least one scores with respect to some scale, based on an assessment by some party

name: QualitativeRatingScore
explanatoryNote: Ratings for the creditworthiness of securities are often qualitative, rather than quantitative, such as a triple-A (i.e., AAA). Many ratings for products and businesses on the Internet are also qualitative, such as 5-star ratings for something.
definition: rating score that is represented as a qualitative code with respect to some rating scale
label: qualitative rating score

name: RatingScore
definition: grade, classification, or ranking of for something in accordance with some rating scale
explanatoryNote: The meaning and methodology for determining a rating score for the rating of something is determined by a rating issuer. A given rating may apply at some point in time, as a part of a lifecycle or process, or generally. Typically ratings reflect an assessment of a state of affairs at some point in time.
label: rating score

name: RatingAssessmentActivity
definition: assessment activity resulting in a grade or score and potentially a report describing the score and the process used to determine that score
label: rating assessment activity

name: QuantitativeRatingScore
label: quantitative rating score
definition: rating score that is a simple numeric value on some scale, such as a credit rating for an individual

name: RatingAssessmentEvent
definition: individual assessment resulting in a grade or score and potentially a report describing the score
label: rating assessment event

name: RatingIssuer
explanatoryNote: A rating issuer is frequently, but not always the rating scale publisher. A rating issuer may delegate responsibility for producing a rating to a rating party.
definition: party that is responsible for issuing ratings
label: rating issuer

name: RatingAgency
label: rating agency
definition: rating issuer that is also a rating scale publisher, frequently but not always an independent rating service

name: RatingScalePublisher
definition: party responsible for managing one or more rating schemes and potentially publishing ratings based on those schemes
label: rating scale publisher
explanatoryNote: Rating scale publishers are frequently also rating agencies.

name: RatingParty
label: rating party
definition: person, organization or group that analyzes some aspect of something and develops a rating

name: RatingScale
label: rating scale
definition: system for assigning a value to something according to some scale with respect to quality, a standard, or ranking

name: RatingReport
definition: report describing a set of ratings
label: rating report

name: rates
label: rates
definition: indicates the instrument, party or something else to which a rating applies

name: hasRatingScore
definition: indicates the grade or score associated with a rating with respect to a particular rating scale
label: has rating score

name: hasRating
definition: indicates the rating assigned to a thing based on a grade or score according to a particular rating scale
label: has rating

name: hasBestMeasure
explanatoryNote: Note that hasBestMeasure and hasWorstMeasure may be used together to determine the direction and range of a scale's measure values.
label: has best measure
definition: indicates the 'best' (most desirable) possible value for a rating score's hasMeasureWithinScale property

name: hasWorstMeasure
definition: indicates the 'worst' (least desirable) possible value for a rating score's hasMeasureWithinScale property
explanatoryNote: Note that hasBestMeasure and hasWorstMeasure may be used together to determine the direction and range of a scale's measure values.
label: has worst measure

name: usesRatingParty
definition: rating performer an issuer uses to assess ratings
label: uses rating performer

name: producesRatingsFor
definition: issuer for which ratings are produced or posted through
label: produces ratings for

name: hasMeasureWithinScale
label: has measure within scale
definition: indicates a relative, numeric measure or ordering on a rating scale
